about_the_game:
This game is a simple and short third-person 3D shooting game.
It is a free add-on to the base game.
Take control of the protagonist, explore the research facility, defeat enemies using your gun, and rescue Dr. Nagase, who was kidnapped by a mysterious organization. Dr. Scarlet Nagase  is one of the developers of the XF fighter jet.

How to Play
When you press "Play" in the Steam app, you can select this game.

Features of this DLC Game
A simple and short third-person 3D shooting game.
Players control Alice, the protagonist, in a third-person 3D view.
Defeat enemies with your gun. Alice can use skills, including destroying doors with a fire skill.
Operate all devices to open the path to rescuing the doctor.

Controls
Move: W, A, S, D
Jump: Space Key
Attack: Left Mouse Click
Aim: Right Mouse Click
Reload Gun: R
Run: Shift Key
Pause Menu: ESC Key
Operate Device: Approach the device
Equip/Unequip Gun: E Key
Use Fire Skill to Destroy Doors: Number 1 Key
Use Wind Skill: Number 2 Key
Heal Yourself: Q Key

Options: Tab Key

movies.name: Air Combat MF - Mini TPS Mission PV

name: Air Combat MF - Mini TPS Mission

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core or AMD Dual-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050ti,AMD Radeon RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (7th) or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1600 MB available space

short_description: This game is a simple and short third-person 3D shooting game. This game is a free add-on for the base game Air Combat MF.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Japanese
